description: This file declares the IFactories interface inside the WPEFramework::PluginHost namespace, providing factory methods for creating various web-related proxy objects. It also includes licensing and copyright information.

classes.name: IFactories
classes.description: An interface defining factory methods for creating web request and response objects, file bodies, and JSONRPC messages.

methods.name: ~IFactories
methods.description: Virtual destructor for the IFactories interface.

methods.name: Instance
methods.description: Returns a reference to the singleton instance of IFactories.

methods.name: IsAvailable
methods.description: Checks if the factory instance is available.

methods.name: Request
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a Web::Request proxy object.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a Web::Response proxy object.

methods.name: FileBody
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a Web::FileBody proxy object.

methods.name: JSONRPC
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a Web::JSONBodyType<Core::JSONRPC::Message> proxy object.
